sentences.sContent: Upstairs, one of the twins began to howl (= cry ) .
sentences.sCn: 楼上，双胞胎中的一个开始大哭起来。

sentences.sContent: He makes audiences howl with laughter .

words.tran: 咆哮的；极大的；哭哭啼啼的
大声叫喊者；嚎叫的人或动物；滑稽可笑的错误

trans.tranOther: to make a long loud cry because you are unhappy, angry, or in pain, or because you are amused or excited
a long loud sound made by a dog,  wolf  , or other animal
